overview: 'San Francisco Meat Packers' packs in all your favorite cuts of meat, from rump roast to prime beef, but their specialty is Grade XXX man meat. Their slogan is "Packin' the best meat in town" — and they live up to every word, delivering the choicest cuts deep into their coworkers! These meat packin’ tops have extra-large tube steaks that will leave you smackin' your lips and begging for more. And for all the pork lovers out there, 'San Francisco Meat Packers' is full of raunchy sex pig bottoms eager to take every inch. In Part 2, director Tony Dimarco serves up only the most prime and choice cuts. It’s grilling season, and the 'San Francisco Meat Packers' are offering tips on how best to enjoy meat. There's nothing like a hot joint to ward off the chill of a cold meat locker.
tagline: Packin' the Best Meat in Town
title: San Francisco Meat Packers 2
